About Me

Hi, my name is Jack and I’m a freelance photographer living in Wellington, NZ

From as far back as I can remember, I have always been fascinated with the art of still imagery. I can vividly remember as a young child taking my parent's Nikon photo camera everywhere and experimenting with capturing special life moments.

My photographs have been published world wide, in magazines, as well as a wide variety of print and digital media such as books, websites, calendars etc.

I am currently available for event, sport and portrait photography and you can reach my via the social links below or through the provided contact form. I look forward to hearing from you!

“I think of photography like therapy”

Jack Robert
